div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 388px; height: 1px; padding-top: 11px; margin-left: 192px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

td.style: vertical-align: top; border-width: 1px; border-style: solid; border-color: light-dark(rgb(158, 158, 158), rgb(101, 101, 101)); padding: 10px;

span.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237)); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: 対象システムの機密性への影響

td.style: vertical-align: top; border-width: 1px; border-style: solid; border-color: light-dark(rgb(158, 158, 158), rgb(101, 101, 101)); padding: 10px;

span.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237)); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: 攻撃者が特権IDでアクセスできる場合、データベース全体のダウンロードも可能となり、個人情報など大規模情報漏洩の原因となりうる（最近も事例あり）

td.style: vertical-align: top; border-width: 1px; border-style: solid; border-color: light-dark(rgb(158, 158, 158), rgb(101, 101, 101)); padding: 10px;

span.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237)); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: 対象システムの完全性への影響

td.style: vertical-align: top; border-width: 1px; border-style: solid; border-color: light-dark(rgb(158, 158, 158), rgb(101, 101, 101)); padding: 10px;

span.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237)); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: 攻撃者が特権IDでアクセスできる場合、データの書き換えなどが自由に実施でき、対象システムの完全性を保つことはできない

td.style: vertical-align: top; border-width: 1px; border-style: solid; border-color: light-dark(rgb(158, 158, 158), rgb(101, 101, 101)); padding: 10px;

span.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237)); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: 対象システムの可用性への影響

td.style: vertical-align: top; border-width: 1px; border-style: solid; border-color: light-dark(rgb(158, 158, 158), rgb(101, 101, 101)); padding: 10px;

span.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237)); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: 特権IDのパスワードを喪失した場合、対象システムの運用作業、障害対応作業ができなくなり、対象システムの可用性に致命的なダメージを与える

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 88px; height: 1px; padding-top: 74px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 88px; height: 1px; padding-top: 134px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 88px; height: 1px; padding-top: 194px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
